00032 Prefix::Prefix()
00033 {
00034     this->_TABLE="prefix";
00035 }
00036 
00037 QList<QStringList> Prefix::getFields(const QStringList fields) const{
00038     QList<QStringList> valuelist;
00039     QSqlQuery query;
00040     QString sqlquery="SELECT ";
00041 
00042     for (int i = 0; i < fields.size(); ++i){
00043     sqlquery.append(fields.at(i));
00044     if (i < (fields.size() - 1))
00045         sqlquery.append(", ");
00046     }
00047     sqlquery.append(" FROM ");
00048     sqlquery.append(this->_TABLE);
00049     sqlquery.append(" ORDER BY id");
00050 
00051     if (query.exec(sqlquery)){
00052         while (query.next()) {
00053             QStringList values;
00054             for (int i = 0; i < fields.size(); ++i){
00055                values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00056             }
00057             valuelist.append(values);
00058         }
00059     } else {
00060         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00061     }
00062 
00063     return valuelist;
00064 }
00065 
00066 QList<QStringList> Prefix::getFields(void) const{
00067     QList<QStringList> valuelist;
00068     //                      0   1     2     3             4            5            6          7            8
00069     QSqlQuery query("SELECT id, name, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive FROM prefix ORDER BY id");
00070     if (query.exec()){
00071         while (query.next()) {
00072             QStringList values;
00073             int i=0;
00074             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00075                 values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00076                 i++;
00077             }
00078             valuelist.append(values);
00079         }
00080     } else {
00081         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00082     }
00083 
00084     return valuelist;
00085 }

00087 QList<QStringList> Prefix::getFieldsByKey(const QStringList fields, const QStringList keys,  const QStringList vals) const{
00088     QList<QStringList> valuelist;
00089     QSqlQuery query;
00090     QString sqlquery="SELECT ";
00091 
00092     for (int i = 0; i < fields.size(); ++i){
00093     sqlquery.append(fields.at(i));
00094     if (i < (fields.size() - 1))
00095         sqlquery.append(", ");
00096     }
00097 
00098     sqlquery.append(" FROM ");
00099     sqlquery.append(this->_TABLE);
00100     sqlquery.append(" WHERE ");
00101 
00102     for (int i = 0; i < keys.size(); ++i){
00103     sqlquery.append(keys.at(i));
00104     sqlquery.append("=");
00105     sqlquery.append(vals.at(i));
00106     if (i < (keys.size() - 1))
00107         sqlquery.append(", ");
00108     }
00109 
00110     sqlquery.append(" ORDER BY id");
00111 
00112     if (query.exec(sqlquery)){
00113         while (query.next()) {
00114             QStringList values;
00115             for (int i = 0; i < fields.size(); ++i){
00116                values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00117             }
00118             valuelist.append(values);
00119         }
00120     } else {
00121         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00122     }
00123     return valuelist;
00124 }

00126 QStringList Prefix::getFieldsByPrefixName(const QString prefix_name) const{
00127     QStringList values;
00128     QSqlQuery query;
00129     //                    0   1     2             3            4            5          6            7
00130     query.prepare("SELECT id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");
00131     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00132 
00133     if (query.exec()){
00134         query.first();
00135         if (query.isValid()){
00136         int i=0;
00137             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00138                 values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00139                 i++;
00140             }
00141         }
00142     } else {
00143         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00144     }
00145     return values;
00146 }

00152     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");

00154 
00155     if (query.exec()){
00156         query.first();
00157         if (query.isValid()){
00158         int i=0;
00159             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00160                 value.append(query.value(i).toString());
00161                 i++;
00162             }

00171 QString Prefix::getPath(const QString prefix_name) const{
00172     QString value;
00173     QSqlQuery query;
00174 
00175     query.prepare("SELECT path FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");
00176     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00177 
00178     if (query.exec()){
00179         query.first();
00180         if (query.isValid()){
00181             if (query.value(0).toString().isEmpty()){
00182                 value = QDir::homePath();
00183                 value.append("/.wine");
00184             } else {
00185                 value.append(query.value(0).toString());
00186             }
00187         }
00188     } else {
00189         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00190     }
00191     return value;
00192 }

00194 QString Prefix::getMountPath(const QString prefix_name) const{
00195     QString value;
00196     QSqlQuery query;
00197 
00198     query.prepare("SELECT cdrom_mount FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");
00199     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00200 
00201     if (query.exec()){
00202         query.first();
00203         if (query.isValid()){
00204             if (query.value(0).toString().isEmpty()){
00205                 value = QDir::homePath();
00206                 value.append("/.wine");
00207             } else {
00208                 value.append(query.value(0).toString());
00209             }
00210         }
00211     } else {
00212         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00213     }
00214     return value;
00215 }

00240 bool Prefix::updateQuery(QSqlQuery *sqlQuery) const{
00241     if (!sqlQuery->exec()){
00242         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<sqlQuery->lastError();
00243         return false;
00244     }
00245     return true;
00246 }
00247 
00248 bool Prefix::delByName(const QString prefix_name) const{
00249     QSqlQuery query;
00250     query.prepare("DELETE FROM prefix WHERE id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name )");
00251     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00252 
00253     if (!query.exec()){
00254         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00255         return false;
00256     }
00257     return true;
00258 }

00261 bool Prefix::addPrefix(const QString prefix_name, const QString prefix_path, const QString wine_exec, const QString wine_server, const QString wine_loader, const QString wine_dllpath, const QString cdrom_mount, const QString cdrom_drive) const{
00262     QSqlQuery query;
00263     query.prepare("INSERT INTO prefix(name, path, wine_exec, wine_server, wine_loader, wine_dllpath, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive) VALUES(:prefix_name, :prefix_path, :wine_exec, :wine_server, :wine_loader, :wine_dllpath, :cdrom_mount, :cdrom_drive);");
00264 
00265     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00266 
00267     if (prefix_path.isEmpty()){
00268         query.bindValue(":prefix_path", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00269     } else {
00270         query.bindValue(":prefix_path", prefix_path);
00271     }
00272 
00273     if (wine_exec.isEmpty()){
00274         query.bindValue(":wine_exec", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00275     } else {
00276         query.bindValue(":wine_exec", wine_exec);
00277     }
00278 
00279     if (wine_server.isEmpty()){
00280         query.bindValue(":wine_server", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00281     } else {
00282         query.bindValue(":wine_server", wine_server);
00283     }
00284 
00285     if (wine_loader.isEmpty()){
00286         query.bindValue(":wine_loader", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00287     } else {
00288         query.bindValue(":wine_loader", wine_loader);
00289     }
00290 
00291     if (wine_dllpath.isEmpty()){
00292         query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00293     } else {
00294         query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", wine_dllpath);
00295     }
00296 
00297     if (cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00298         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00299     } else {
00300         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", cdrom_mount);
00301     }
00302 
00303     if (cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
00304         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00305     } else {
00306         if (cdrom_drive==QObject::tr("<none>")){
00307             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00308         } else {
00309             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", cdrom_drive);
00310         }
00311     }
00312 
00313     if (!query.exec()){
00314         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00315         return false;
00316     }
00317 
00318     return true;
00319 }

00321 bool Prefix::updatePrefix(const QString prefix_name, const QString prefix_path, const QString wine_exec, const QString wine_server, const QString wine_loader, const QString wine_dllpath, const QString cdrom_mount, const QString cdrom_drive, const QString old_prefix_name) const{
00322     QSqlQuery query;
00323     query.prepare("UPDATE prefix SET wine_dllpath=:wine_dllpath, wine_loader=:wine_loader, wine_server=:wine_server, wine_exec=:wine_exec, cdrom_mount=:cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive=:cdrom_drive, name=:prefix_name, path=:prefix_path WHERE name=:old_prefix_name");
00324 
00325     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00326     query.bindValue(":old_prefix_name", old_prefix_name);
00327 
00328     if (prefix_path.isEmpty()){
00329         query.bindValue(":prefix_path", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00330     } else {
00331         query.bindValue(":prefix_path", prefix_path);
00332     }
00333 
00334     if (wine_exec.isEmpty()){
00335         query.bindValue(":wine_exec", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00336     } else {
00337         query.bindValue(":wine_exec", wine_exec);
00338     }
00339 
00340     if (wine_server.isEmpty()){
00341         query.bindValue(":wine_server", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00342     } else {
00343         query.bindValue(":wine_server", wine_server);
00344     }
00345 
00346     if (wine_loader.isEmpty()){
00347         query.bindValue(":wine_loader", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00348     } else {
00349         query.bindValue(":wine_loader", wine_loader);
00350     }
00351 
00352     if (wine_dllpath.isEmpty()){
00353         query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00354     } else {
00355         query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", wine_dllpath);
00356     }
00357 
00358     if (cdrom_mount.isEmpty()){
00359         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00360     } else {
00361         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", cdrom_mount);
00362     }
00363 
00364     if (cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
00365         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00366     } else {
00367         if (cdrom_drive==QObject::tr("<none>")){
00368             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00369         } else {
00370             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", cdrom_drive);
00371         }
00372     }
00373 
00374     if (!query.exec()){
00375         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00376         return false;
00377     }
00378 
00379     return true;
00380 }

00383 bool Prefix::isExistsByName(const QString prefix_name) const{
00384     QSqlQuery query;
00385     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");
00386     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00387 
00388     if (!query.exec()){
00389         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00390         return false;
00391     }
00392     
00393     query.first();
00394     if (query.isValid()){
00395         return true;
00396     }
00397 
00398     return false;
00399 }
